---
title: "Clustering for Clust1"
output: html_notebook
---

Wonder what Kmeans does to the data collected in clust101pt1

```{r}
install.packages("readxl")
library(readxl)

data101 <- read_excel("clust101pt1.xlsx", sheet = "Modified")

head(data101)

#find 3 clusters based on the data in 'Analysis cat count' spreadsheet
kClusters <-3

#convert the data to data frame for kmeans processing.
data101 <- as.data.frame(data101)

#calculate the Kmeans for the ANCATC data into 3 clusters.
kMeansResult <- kmeans(data101[c("Average Age","Average Annual Income")], centers = kClusters)

#create a new column in dataANCATC and apply the cluster value for use in plots.
data101$cluster <- kMeansResult$cluster
#convert the cluster column to factor type.
data101$cluster <- as.factor(data101$cluster)
```
